root.name: Breach
root.description: Breach is a tactical turn based strategy game in which you command a team of space marines on various missions. The missions vary from data device retrieval to hostage rescue and elimination, in all there are ten missions to complete. A mission editor is included so that you can build your own missions.Your squad leader can advance in stats and basic ability on completion of a mission. How much the leader advances depends on how successful the mission was.
